resources.string: Hello! If you require help, then click on the \'Help\' button above. \n In case you don\'t, write down the amount of minutes you need for work and break time below:
You should enter the work time!
You should enter the break time!
It\'s impossible to not work at all!
You should rest at least a little!
Your break is too huge! Why don\'t you drop it a little?
Your break is too small! Why don\'t you expand it a little?
Ooh, careful! Your work time is past 24 hours!
Your break time is past 24 hours! Sure you want to rest this much?
Time\'s up! Let\'s have a break, shall we?
How the time flies! Now is the time to get to work.
